title: Anyone having FPS drops SPECIFIC TO THIS 7.1 Warring Kingdoms update?
body:
I've had two games so far where my FPS gradually drops as the game goes on. The only similarities between the two games were both had Miss Fortune and Vi.

My ranked promos had Pool Party MF whereas this most recent Naut game of mine had an Arcade MF.
I'm of the opinion Warring Kingdoms Vi might have an issue that causes FPS to slowly deteriorate, but I'm entirely sure.

replies.body:
Yes, other people are having the issue. I am having the issue and If you ask your teammates and opponents they will also be having the issue. Unfortunately, Rito is just going to point you towards their FPS Issues guide. I have tried most of the guide, except contacting support, turning off all non-windows services and disabling all sound. However, my FPS was fine the 1000's of games before this patch and nothing has changed on my end, so I just don't see what that will do for me. Of course, i'm going to try it, because I want to play the game and in its currents state it's not enjoyable. I understand that Support has to give answers like we are the lowest common denominator (Have you tried rebooting), but what's maddening is the gross dismissal that the problem could be on their end. 
Good Luck.

Same. Did everything in the FPS guide, contacted support and did all that jazz. Still happens. This has never happened before, i have a 1070 so i'm pretty sure it's not my system if it happens to everyone in the game also. Until Riot realizes the issue is from their side since the lunar festival update, we're screwed. I can't play like that till they fix it.

Next time it happens, kill the new client's processes and see if that fixes your FPS.

The beta client will restart automatically and you'll see the FPS drops return. But at least if this can be reproduced reliably, we know for SURE it's the new client.

Hey Guys!

I just left a similar post on the EUW forums, because me and all my friends are having the exact same issue. 

The issue only started for us since the skins had been released (not the start of the actual patch, for us anyways).
Our framerate gradually drops in games, this happens in both normals, ranked AND custom bot games too. 
We got to the point where our framerate was at around 20fps for all players on the team, by the end of a 40 min game (we all usually get at least 120+, most even get an average of around 300).

All of us have tried various fixes, and we all have up to date hardware/software/drivers, and have had 0 issues before the skin releases.

Cant find any solution yet though :/
Just wanted to share to say I had the issue too, hopefully to alert riot that its not on our end.

Edit: Each game we have had an issue, the enemy team have also had at least one or two players with the same problems too.

- LightspeedRed

As stated in another comment, I went into a game where it was an issue RIGHT OFF THE BAT. I killed the new client's processes and it cleared up... until the new client automatically restarted and it happened again.

See if this happens for you.

Should this be the case, it's an issue with the new client.

Im also having the exact same issue, gradual loss of framerate to the almost impossible to play with framerate by 20mins, most of my friends also having the same issue. Also only having the issue since the warring kindoms skin release. I have a high spec pc and have tried all the suggested fixes on the support website to no avail.

I went into a game and  my FPS plummeted RIGHT OFF THE BAT. Started killing the new client's processes and it fixed it... until the new client automatically restarted itself.

So let me know if just switching to the legacy client helps should it happen to you again.

We sadly need to D/C and reconnect again to help Riot find and resolve this issue. :c

I've seen a few reports on the boards regarding fps issues with the lunar revel event, and would like to investigate further.  To start, make sure to run through each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as frame drops can be caused by a bad game file or outdated driver.  

If the issue persists, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look further into these.  Be sure to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to the ticket to help investigate further.  We will reply back as soon as we can, or post any [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) updates as needed.

It appears my problem can be reliably resolved by... killing the beta client's process.

Something snuck into the Warring Kingdoms update that changed the client?
It seems to play a playable game (without stuttering), I need to go legacy. :(
